GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: oss: Fix race at SNDCTL_DSP_SYNC

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit 8015ef9e8a0ee5cecfd0cb6805834d007ab26f86. For more details please see the references link.
